preferences.name: useCustomIP
preferences.title: Use a custom Server IP
preferences.description: Use a custom Server IP. Default: 'false'

preferences.name: serverIP
preferences.title: Server IP
preferences.description: The Server IP to connect to. Default: 'localhost'

preferences.description: The Server Port to connect to. Default: '8888'
